title: >>> RUMORS Welcome
body_text:
With DODGEBALL 13 nearing, one can only imagine the number of players it will bring. XONE, and more so XTWO, shocked the world with incredible numbers of 33 and 42, respectively. DODGEBALL 13 could be the most unpredictable dodgeball event ever, at least in terms of attendance. Never the less, 13 will be an awesome event all will enjoy and hopefully, new players will turn up.
... But in the meantime ...
Rumors are circulating around the dodgeball scene this week as this great event approaches. Are these claims true?
I.
The DODGEBALL 14/XIV promo will not be created by KJohn. Could this be true?
II.
Ryan McCrorey, the only player to have debuted at DODGEBALL DAY 4 and participate in every event since, is said to miss his first event this coming Saturday.
III.
Heavy hitter and Hall of Famer Mike Rozz is said to miss the next two dodgeball events due to a family vacation.
IV.
The Asbury Park Press is rumored to be stopping by to check out this new craze in our area. A possible news story could cover what has taken place in the past few weeks.
~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
That concludes the 2nd edition of "RUMORS Welcome".
DODGEBALL 13 is shaping up to be a memorable event.
